data: I first met Mr. Baxter at the fourpenny box outside Mr. Timpenny’s second-hand bookshop in High Street, and was attracted at once by the loving care with which he handled its contents.
fourpenny box | Mr. Timpenny’s second-hand bookshop | High Street
